abstract: JPMorgan Cazenove, JPMorgan Chase‘s joint venture with Britain’s Cazenove & Company, named Naguib Kheraj as its chief executive, ending a five-month search for a permanent replacement for Robert Pickering.
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Cazenove, JPMorgan Chase‘s joint venture with Britain’s Cazenove & Company, named Naguib Kheraj as its chief executive, ending a five-month search for a permanent replacement for Robert Pickering.

headline.main: JPMorgan Cazenove Picks Ex-Barclays Executive as New Chief
